tasks.label: Build Image and Run
tasks.command: docker build -t mysql-adde . && docker run --env-file .env -d --name mysql-adde-db -p 127.0.0.1:3307:3306 -v mysql-data:/var/lib/mysql mysql-adde
tasks.detail: Builds the MySQL image with embedded SQL scripts and runs the container

tasks.label: Clear all
tasks.command: docker stop mysql-adde-db && docker rm mysql-adde-db && docker volume rm mysql-data

tasks.label: Recreate (with volume reset)
tasks.command: docker stop mysql-adde-db || true && docker rm mysql-adde-db || true && docker volume rm mysql-data || true && docker build -t mysql-adde . && docker run --env-file .env -d --name mysql-adde-db -p 127.0.0.1:3307:3306 -v mysql-data:/var/lib/mysql mysql-adde
